title: ‘Top Gun: Maverick’: 100 Things We Loved About It
description:
Movies are back, Maverick is back, Tom Cruise is back, and Sean and Amanda are back to dive deep into the movie phenomenon of this young summer: ‘Top Gun: Maverick.’

Hosts: Sean Fennessey and Amanda Dobbins
Producer: Bobby Wagner
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
